author: Lou Holtz
message: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do.Attitude determines how well you do it.
title: Thought of the day

author: Thomas Carlyle
message: Do not be embarrassed by your mistakes. Nothing can teach us better than our understanding of them. This is one of the best ways of self-education.
title: Thought of the day

author: Buddha
message: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
title: Thought of the day

author: Michel de Montaigne
message: I care not so much what I am to others as what I am to myself. I will be rich by myself, and not by borrowing.
title: Thought of the day
